hero.name: Your Name
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.summary: A result-oriented Software Engineer with over 8 years of experience in application development, specializing in backend and frontend technologies.

skills.title: Skills
skills.experienceSummary: Over 8 years of experience has allowed me to develop expertise across various technologies and tools. Here's a comprehensive overview of my technical skills.
skills.backendDescription: My core expertise lies in Laravel and PHP, where I've built numerous scalable applications. I have extensive experience with different database systems including MySQL and MongoDB, along with performance optimization through Redis caching.
skills.frontendDescription: I specialize in Vue.js for building dynamic and responsive user interfaces. My experience ranges from creating custom components to managing complex application state and integrating with RESTful APIs.
skills.ctaDescription: Check out my experience and projects to see how I've applied these skills in real-world scenarios.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.summaryText: A result-oriented Software Engineer with over 7 years of experience in application development, specializing in backend and frontend technologies such as Laravel, PHP, Vue.js, and MySQL. Adept at building scalable applications, optimizing performance, and implementing innovative solutions to enhance user experience.
experience.additionalInfo: Proficient in Agile methodologies, Git version control, and cloud-based services like AWS.
experience.experienceSummary: With over 8 years of experience in software development, I have worked across various domains and technologies. Below is a summary of my professional journey.
experience.learnMore: Learn more about my educational background and projects I've worked on throughout my career.

fullstack.title: Full-stack Web Development
fullstack.description: Expertise in Laravel, Vue.js, and MySQL to develop scalable applications.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Efficiently optimizing database queries and backend processing.

agile.title: Agile Development
agile.description: Proficient in working with Agile teams and managing project sprints.

problemSolving.title: Problem Solving
problemSolving.description: Strong analytical skills to troubleshoot and debug applications.

versionControl.title: Version Control & CI/CD
versionControl.description: Git, Jira, and automated deployment pipelines.

description: Working as a Vue.js and Laravel developer, building and optimizing web applications.
Enhancing performance, ensuring code scalability, and improving system architecture.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement new features.
Modified and added new features to an existing application using Laravel, MySQL, and AWS.
Implemented Redis caching to improve application performance.
Worked on cloud solutions for high availability and scalability.
Developed and maintained applications using Laravel, Redis, and MongoDB.
Implemented Laravel Echo Server and Laravel Supervisor for real-time messaging.
Optimized database queries and reduced API response times.
Built web applications using Laravel and Vue.js.
Customized Magento applications to enhance e-commerce functionality.
Developed APIs and integrated third-party services.
Developed UI components and customized WordPress themes/templates.
Improved frontend performance and user experience.
Worked on in-house projects using Laravel and MySQL.
Designed and developed user-friendly interfaces and backend systems.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.cta: Interested in working together? Feel free to reach out for collaborations or just a friendly hello.

success.title: Message sent successfully!
success.description: Thank you for reaching out. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
